title: Perfect Circles
description: Two years after a mysterious bag lady bestows on her the gift of two gold rings entwined, Callie Dailie arrives in a small mountain town called Cherrywood. Walking the trails behind the cabin she's come to call home, she stumbles upon a stranger - an old man named Thomas Yellow Feather.Slowly, he reveals the true meaning of the rings and her destiny begins to unfold. Together they journey to a sacred place hidden inside a mountain cavern, where ancient paintings on the walls tell the story of Forever One.Yet, the future of the cavern is set to disappear beneath the insatiable hunger of land vultures and the heavy fist of progress. The old one believes that Callie and the one she has come to find, hold the key to saving the cavern and everything it stands for.But he couldn't know that his estranged son would be her most ominous threat of all, or that the one she has come to find... was tied to someone else in a tangled web of deception.Perfect Circles is a story about love, freedom and being who you are.
author: Lisa Mary Jackson
